Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
mindustry.type.Weapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildWeapon, PointDefenseWeapon, RepairBeamWeapon
public class Weapon extends Object implements Cloneable
